meanings.sent3: His refusal to share the toys embitters the playtime.
meanings.sent4: The loss of a loved one embitters the sweetness of life.
meanings.sent5: The bitter taste of failure embitters the heart.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel bitter or resentful
meanings.sent1: Her harsh words embitters her sister.
meanings.sent3: The cat's refusal to play embitters the dog.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds of doubt embitters the mind.
meanings.sent5: The lack of recognition embitters hard work.
